attributes.action: Fund research into the development and intergration of flying cars to British Airspace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Death, accidents and traffic jams are common throughout Britains roads, however there is an alternative that has been explored yet.

Flying cars will relive all traffic congestion, decrease the amount of time driving (direct routes) and cut deaths on the road to 0 as 
A) Cars wont be on the road to cause deaths
B)If you have a flying car you will not want to crash it

So i urge the government to give more funding to this new form of eco-friendly travel.
